participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and imaginative with a passion for storytelling and nature.
participant_1.background: My cupcake business keeps me busy, but I also enjoy hiking and biking in my new home state of Florida. I remember pretending to be a dragon trainer with my siblings at the park and getting lost in our imagination. I am a children's librarian. I'm working on my car in the garage, and dreaming of Australia. But, I feel lost and far away from who I truly am.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and adventurous, with a love for baking and a deep appreciation for life's little moments.
participant_2.background: I collect memories and seashells from my travels. I try to keep myself fit and healthy, but I haven't been in a relationship for a long time. I'm a receptionist at a doctor's office. Baking is my passion, and I have a soft spot for dogs. I'm interested in learning more about how to use social media to advertise my business.

content.text: Pretty good so far! Just got back from a hike.
Oh nice! Where did you hike?
I hiked in the Everglades. It was amazing! The wildlife was incredible!
That sounds so cool! I've never been to the Everglades.
You should definitely go! It's one of the most beautiful places I've ever been.
I'll have to add it to my list!
So what do you do for fun?
I'm a children's librarian. I love my job!
That sounds like a really fun job! Do you get to read to kids?
Yes! I love reading to kids. It's the best part of my job!
That's so cool! I love reading too.
Oh nice! What are some of your favorite books?
I love the Harry Potter series
